mean_cn: v. 与……发生矛盾，与……抵触，与……对立
mean_en: to say that something that somebody else has said is wrong, and that the opposite is true; (of statements or pieces of evidence) to be so different from each other that one of them must be wrong
sentence: The signs contradict each other. Which way should we go?
sentence_trans: 这些标志互相矛盾，我们应该走哪条路呢？
word_etyma: contra反对，相反 + dict说 → 反着说 → contradict反驳
